 2013-05362013-05-02,  NRCAN,  CNSC,  ,  ,  , 
ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
SubjectCNSC-PIPSC - Nuclear Regulatory Group ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder authorizing the renewal of the COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT between the CANADIAN NUCLEAR SAFETY COMMISSION AND THE PROFESSIONAL INSTITUTE OF THE PUBLIC SERVICE OF CANADA covering employees in the Nuclear Regulatory Group Bargaining Unit. This agreement is for a term of three (3) years from April 1, 2011 to March 31, 2014.
AttachmentsAttachment
